LanguageData.WNA_BA_FaithfulBeliever.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had been serving for the great work for Whelingnorther Alliance since [PAWN_possessive] grown-up. [PAWN_nameDef] had worked in various positions, gradually forged unshakable will through the years of work.
LanguageData.WNA_BA_FaithfulBeliever.title: faithful believer
LanguageData.WNA_BA_FanaticBeliever.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had been serving for the great work for Whelingnorther Alliance since [PAWN_possessive] grown-up. However [PAWN_pronoun] seemed to have taken a strange path, become increasingly insane and cruel through the years of work.
LanguageData.WNA_BA_FanaticBeliever.title: fanatic believer
LanguageData.WNA_BA_FirstGen.description: When facing the pursuit of two superpowers, [PAWN_nameDef] recieved the enlightment from far-ancient civilization the Whelingnorther Empire. With this power [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] followers got rid of the pursuit, and finally founded the Whelingnorther Alliance.
LanguageData.WNA_BA_FirstGen.title: first generation member
LanguageData.WNA_BA_MidworldRevenger.description: The day come for [PAWN_nameDef] when Whelingnorther Alliance cast their shade over the world [PAWN_nameDef] lives in, and with the aid from Whelingnorther Alliance [PAWN_pronoun] slained all [PAWN_possessive] rivals. The fruit of revenge is unbelievably sweet, [PAWN_nameDef] sang the praises of Whelingnorther and became a fanatic believer.
LanguageData.WNA_BA_MidworldRevenger.title: midworld revenger
LanguageData.WNA_BA_SecondGen.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a second generation member of Whelingnorther Alliance, which means [PAWN_pronoun] has been accused of crimes he didn't commit, whether for political, legal, or other reasons. Luckily with the aid of Whelingnorther Alliance, [PAWN_pronoun] washed away the false accusation with blood.
LanguageData.WNA_BA_SecondGen.title: second generation member
LanguageData.WNA_BA_ThirdGen.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grown up under the shelter of Whelingnorther Alliance as a resident, enjoying the material support and education provided by Whelingnorther Alliance. When [PAWN_pronoun] finally grow up and decided to serve in Whelingnorther Military, [PAWN_pronoun] officially became a national of Whelingnorther Alliance.
LanguageData.WNA_BA_ThirdGen.title: third generation member
LanguageData.WNA_BC_DesperateRevenger.description: Before the arrival of Whelingnorther Alliance, a false accusation made [PAWN_nameDef] lost all [PAWN_possessive] fame abd belongings. Whelingnorther Alliance helped [PAWN_objective] break out from the jail and killed every people responsible for [PAWN_possessive] false asscusation.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_DesperateRevenger.title: desperate revenger
LanguageData.WNA_BC_FactoryWorker.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a factory for living. Everyday [PAWN_pronoun] has to face dangerous facilities, insufficient protections, heavy workload, endless overtime and unreasonable boss, until the arrival of Whelingnorther Alliance changed all of this.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_FactoryWorker.title: factory worker
LanguageData.WNA_BC_Homeless.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had lost [PAWN_possessive] home and all property, had to wander in the streets and sleep on the ground. When Whelingnorther Alliance reached to [PAWN_nameDef]'s world, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to join them, in order to make people won't become homeless anyore.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_Homeless.title: homeless
LanguageData.WNA_BC_Hopeless.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is eager for [PAWN_possessive] own termination, like a hunger man is eager for food, tired man is eager for a rest, a revenger is eager for beheading his rival.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_Hopeless.title: hopeless
LanguageData.WNA_BC_Martyr.description: The idea of Whelingnorther Alliance has deeply moved [PAWN_nameDef] since [PAWN_possessive] young age. [PAWN_nameDef] is prepared to gave up all of [PAWN_objective] and sacrifice for the great work of Whelingnorther Alliance.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_Martyr.title: martyr
LanguageData.WNA_BC_MidworldPeasant.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grown up in the fields, before Whelingnorther Alliance's influence interrupting [PAWN_possessive] life, everything [PAWN_pronoun] had in [PAWN_possessive] daily routine is endless farmwork.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_MidworldPeasant.title: midworld peasant
LanguageData.WNA_BC_MidworldRebel.description: Before the arrival of Whelingnorther Alliance, [PAWN_nameDef] has been participating in armed rebellion to overthrow the rule of the privileged class. After the arrival of Whelingnorther Alliance, [PAWN_nameDef] joined them to slain more privileged.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_MidworldRebel.title: midworld rebel
